category: Jury Committee Regulations/Article 4 (Functions of the Committee)
contents: Article 4 (Functions of the Committee) The Committee deliberates on the following matters. Revised on January 31, 2019. 1. Matters pertaining to how to ensure the independence and autonomy of referees so that they can perform their duties fairly according to the game rules. 2. Matters pertaining to the protection and promotion of refereesâ€™ rights and interests. 3. Referee training ( Matters related to the Referee Academy) 4. Matters related to referee registration and management 5. Matters related to referee evaluation 6. Other matters necessary to achieve the purpose of establishing the committee Revised 2019. 1. 31. [Title revised 2021. 12. 27 .][Full revision 2021. 12. 27.]
